alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 4:49PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Baton Rouge, southeastern Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 545 PM CST... At 449 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plaquemine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Inniswold, Village St. George, Bayou Sorrel, Shenandoah, Gardere and Carville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 161 and 168. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
